newsitem.title: USA: Fiserv says growth on pace for record '97.
newsitem.headline: Fiserv says growth on pace for record '97.

text.p: Fiserv Inc, reporting stronger first-quarter results, said its strong sales growth continues the company on pace for a record year.
"We've had a good start, and our pipeline for new business activity remains very active for the second quarter and remainder of 1997," said president Leslie Muma in a statement.
In addition to new sales, Fiserv, a provider of financial data processing systems, is exploring potential alliances with other technology-based companies, Muma added.
Earlier Monday, Fiserv posted first-quarter earnings of $0.39 per share, up from $0.32 a year ago. Total revenues rose to $206.5 million from $194.7 million.
